tasks.task: Visit one club that has fewer than 12 members.拜访一个会员少于12人的俱乐部。
Visit one club that has more than 25 members.拜访一个会员超过25人的俱乐部。
Bring at least one guest to a club meeting. 至少请一位来宾参加俱乐部会议。
Bring a guest to join toastmasters membership. 邀请一个来宾入会。
Introduce yourself to every guest that comes to your club and be interested in who they are.向每一位来到你的俱乐部的客人介绍你自己，并对他们是谁感兴趣。
Shake hands with every guest in the meeting.与会议中的每个来宾握手。
